definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נַחְפְּשׁוּ]] Ob:Ob 6 subj. [[עֵשָׂו]] coll.; searched out = exposed and plundered (‖[[נִבְעוּ מַחְפּוּנׇיו]]).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: a thing, c. acc. Ge 44:12 (J; Joseph searching for his cup); Ge 31:35 (E; no obj. expr., Laban looking for his teraphim); Am 9:3 (´[[י]] searching for evildoers), Ps 77:7 (soul searching to understand ´[[י]]'s dealings with his servants).

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הִתְחַפֵּשׂ]] 2Ch 35:22 (but LXX [[הִתְחַזֵּק]], cf. also Vulgate SyrVer 3 Es 1:26, so Be Öt); Impf. [[יִתְחַפֵּשׂ]] Job 30:18; [[וַיִּתְחַפֵּשׂ]] 1Sa 28:8 + 3 t.; Inf. abs. [[הִתְחַפֵּשׂ]] 1Ki 22:30 = 2Ch 18:29; —disguise oneself (lit. let oneself be searched for) 1Sa 28:8, 1Ki 22:30, 1Ki 22:30 = 2Ch 18:29, 2Ch 18:29, 2Ch 35:22 (but v. supr.), all of disguise by change of garments; 1Ki 20:38 [[באפר]] i.e. with headgear over eyes; subj. [[לבושׂ]] Job 30:18, i.e. his garment is disguised, no longer looks like the mantle it is.
